### Load Packages

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gt)
library(lubridate)
```

# Read in data

```{r}
housing_mice_df <- read_excel("input/test_2025_12_19_EE_omics_lit_review_mRNA_Proteins.xlsx",
                              sheet = "mice_housing")
```


```{r}
str(housing_mice_df)
summary(housing_mice_df)
colnames(housing_mice_df)
```


```{r}
housing_mice_calc <- housing_mice_df %>% 
  group(animal_type year, author) %>%
  ()
```

```{r}
m
```


## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
